Item ID536

Dragon bones are bones dropped by most adult dragons, which give 72 Prayer experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways:

  • 216 XP when casting Sinister Offering.
  • 216 XP when offered at the Sacred Bone Burner after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
  • 252 XP when offered at a gilded altar with two burners lit or at the Chaos Temple.
  • 288 XP when offered at the Ectofuntus in the form of dragon bonemeal.

The relative ease of collecting dragon bones, combined with the amount of experience earned from them, makes them widely viewed as a fast, cost-effective way to train Prayer.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
20 September 2018
(update)

The value was changed from 110 to 160 so that it would appear above less valuable items when on the ground.

18 January 2018
(update)

The value was changed from 0 to 110 so that it would appear above vials when on the ground.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

All dragon bone drops in the Wilderness are now noted if you have completed the Wilderness Elite Diary.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In RuneScape Classic, Elvarg dropped dragon bones that free-to-play players could Telegrab once they defeated her. These bones were labelled as members object and could not be used unless the player was a member.

[[File:Dragon bones detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Dragon bones''' are bones dropped by most adult [[Dragon (monster)|dragons]], which give 72 [[Prayer]] experience when buried. This can be increased by offering the bones in different ways: 
* 216 XP when casting [[Sinister Offering]].
* 216 XP when offered at the [[Sacred Bone Burner]] after the appropriate faith level has been achieved.
* 252 XP when offered at a [[gilded altar]] with two burners lit or at the [[Chaos Temple (hut)|Chaos Temple]].
* 288 XP when offered at the [[Ectofuntus]] in the form of [[dragon bonemeal]].

The relative ease of collecting dragon bones, combined with the amount of experience earned from them, makes them widely viewed as a fast, cost-effective way to train Prayer.

==Trivia==
*In ''[[RuneScape Classic]]'', [[Elvarg]] dropped dragon bones that [[free-to-play]] players could [[Telegrab]] once they defeated her. These bones were labelled as [[members object]] and could not be used unless the player was a member.
